title: How to Prepare Organic Pesticides   Year 2022

tasks.task: Prepare organic pesticides using herbal materials.
subtasks: Collect necessary materials (aloe vera, red pepper, marigold, nim, tomato leaves, onion).
Clean materials by washing and chopping/pounding into small pieces.
Combine materials in a container for decoction (leaving room for water).
Add water to the container and let it sit for three days.
Strain the solution to separate solids from liquid.
Mix solution to create a 10-liter organic pesticide concentrate.
Verify effectiveness by observing irritant properties (wear protective gear if necessary).
Store and label the organic pesticide for future use.
